question.qText: All of the following were major causes for European conquests of Africa in the late 19<font face='SuperScript'>th</font> and early 20<font face='SuperScript'>th</font> centuries EXCEPT

aBtn.aText: nationalistic feelings among European people living within European empires
economic opportunities in newly conquered territories
competition for power among the European empires
liberal and humanitarian desires to civilize African peoples
technological superiority in industry and weaponry
